Package gui

Contains the application's graphical user interface.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
And2Image And2Image extends the abstract class ComponentImage, and is the gui counterpart to And2Gate.
And3Image And3Image extends the abstract class ComponentImage, and is the gui counterpart to And3Gate.
And4Image And4Image extends the abstract class ComponentImage, and is the gui counterpart to And4Gate.
ButtonImage The gui part of a button.
ComponentDesignPane Displays the design of the new custom component as it is created in the NewComponentDialog.
ComponentImage Extends Displayable to create an abstract super class for all component images.
ComponentPin ComponentPin extends Displayable and is the gui representation of an input/output pin.
CustomImage The gui part of a ComponentImage.
DFlipFlopImage DFlipFlopImage extends the abstract class ComponentImage, and is the gui counterpart to DFlipFlop.
Displayable Displayable is the superclass of all logic components, input/ output pins, wires, and wire nodes.
GroundImage The gui part of a grounded terminal.
Gui Contains the application's main window.
HexDigitImage The gui part of a HexDigit.
JKFlipFlopImage JKFlipFlopImage extends the abstract class ComponentImage, and is the gui counterpart to JKFlipFlop.
LEDImage The gui part of an LED.
Nand2Image Nand2Image extends the abstract class ComponentImage, and is the gui counterpart to Nand2Gate.
Nand3Image Nand3Image extends the abstract class ComponentImage, and is the gui counterpart to Nand3Gate.
Nand4Image Nand4Image extends the abstract class ComponentImage, and is the gui counterpart to Nand4Gate.
NewComponentDialog A dialog box for saving a custom component.
Nor2Image Nor2Image extends the abstract class ComponentImage, and is the gui counterpart to Nor2Gate.
Nor3Image Nor3Image extends the abstract class ComponentImage, and is the gui counterpart to Nor3Gate.
Nor4Image Nor4Image extends the abstract class ComponentImage, and is the gui counterpart to Nor4Gate.
NotImage The gui part of a NOT gate.
Or2Image Or2Image extends the abstract class ComponentImage, and is the gui counterpart to Or2Gate.
Or3Image Or3Image extends the abstract class ComponentImage, and is the gui counterpart to Or3Gate.
Or4Image Or4Image extends the abstract class ComponentImage, and is the gui counterpart to Or4Gate.
PlaceholderPin Represents the pin of a custom component before the component is created.
Sandbox Extends JComponent to provide a workspace for the visual circuit model.
SimDelayDialog A dialog box for editing the signal propagation delay.
SwitchImage The gui part of an ON/OFF switch.
Toybox Extends JTree to display components in groups for the user to select and add to the Sandbox.
VccImage The gui part of a grounded terminal.
WireImage The gui part of a wire.
WireNode A node on a wire (away from input/output pins) that can be dragged to change the shape of a the wire.
Xor2Image Xor2Image extends the abstract class ComponentImage, and is the gui counterpart to Xor2Gate.
 

Package gui Description

Contains the application's graphical user interface. The gui package is responsible for getting commands from the user and issuing them to the controller.

The main classes in the gui package are:

  • Gui: The main JFrame class; communicates with the controller
  • Sandbox: The JComponent that displays the model
  • Palette: The JTree for selecting new components
  • Displayable: The base class for all gui objects displayed in the Sandbox
  • ComponentImage: The base class for gui logic components; correlates with model.LogicComponent
